"Meri": "Thanks for visiting. Well, here's the deal..."
"I made this lunch for Ilma, and I was hoping you could deliver it to him."
"When he gets focused on his research, sometimes he even forgets to eat properly."
"Ilma should be at the research lab near close to Lost Central."
"Sorry for troubling you like this. Thanks!"
"Okay. I'll be here when you're ready."
